item.description: I run a Free Comedy Show at the Grog(downstairs) in Newburyport on Mondays @ 730 with a line up of area comedians,,, everyone from those who have been doing it for a couple years to pro headliners,,, and it changes every week. It's a wonderful way to hear some great acts for free! Also a chance for a newcomer to try their stuff out on stage. Have dinner and a drink or two and come out & laugh!

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Free Comedy Show Mondays
